function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of 'nature' in architecture may not effectively mitigate contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in built environments","Mitigation":"Incorporate anti-microbial materials and ventilation systems in biophilic designs","Technologies":"Anti-microbial coatings, UV-C disinfection systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Architects, building owners, and designers"}]}
